00048 // debugging aid to print informative messages when packing/unpacking
00049 
00050 bool print_pack_info = getenv("print_pack_info");

00053 
00054 // NOTE: unlimited max size 
00055 // memory is allocated dynamically in chunks of 
00056 // sc_bv_base(UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE)
00057 
00058 
00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 //
00061 // CLASS: uvm_packer_rep
00062 //
00063 // Internal implementation class.
00064 // uvm_packer delegetates to this class to do the real work.
00065 //

00074 class uvm_packer_rep {
00075 public:
00076   uvm_packer_rep(uvm_packer* packer);
00077   ~uvm_packer_rep();
00078   //
00079   void allocate(int nbits, bool copy = true);
00080   void reset();
00081   void set_size(int nbits);
00082   //
00083   void put_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v);
00084   void get_bits(std::vector<bool>& v);
00085   void put_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v);
00086   void get_bytes(std::vector<char>& v);
00087   void put_ints(const std::vector<int>& v);
00088   void get_ints(std::vector<int>& v);
00089   void put_uints(const std::vector<unsigned int>& v);
00090   void pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name);
00091   void get_uints(std::vector<unsigned int>& v);
00092   void * unpack_obj_header();
00093   //
00094   bool use_metadata() const { return m_use_metadata; }
00095   void use_metadata(bool b) { m_use_metadata = b; }
00096   //
00097   void check_size(int nbits);
00098 
00099   //
00100   void pack_non_null();
00101   bool unpack_non_null();
00102   void pack_null();

00104   void pack_int_n(uint64 k, unsigned nbits);
00105   uint64 unpack_int_n(unsigned nbits);
00106   //
00107   void pack_char(char);
00108   void unpack_char(char&);
00109   //
00110   void pack_string(std::string s);
00111   void unpack_string(std::string& s);
00112   //
00113   void pack_obj(uvm_object*);

00115   //
00116   void pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic&);
00117   void unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic&);

00119   void unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base&);
00120   void pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base&);
00121   void unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base&);
00122   void pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base&);
00123   void unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base&);
00124   void pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base&);
00125   void unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base&);

00127   void unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed&);
00128   void pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned&);
00129   void unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned&);
00130   //
00131   unsigned get_remaining_unpacked_bits() { return pack_index - unpack_index; }
00132   int get_size() { return size; }
00133   sc_bv_base* get_packed_bits() { return m_bits; }
00134   int get_pack_index() const { return pack_index; }
00135   void set_pack_index(int n) { pack_index = n; }
00136 private:

00138 private:

00142   unsigned unpack_index;
00143

00145   int size;
00146   int max_size;

00153 uvm_packer_rep::uvm_packer_rep(uvm_packer* packer) {
00154   //cout << "in packer ctor " << endl;
00155   m_packer = packer;
00156   m_use_metadata = false;
00157 
00158   pack_index = 0;
00159   unpack_index = 0;
00160 
00161   size = 0;
00162   max_size = 0;
00163   m_bits = 0;
00164 }
00165 
00166 uvm_packer_rep::~uvm_packer_rep() {
00167   //cout << "in packer dtor " << endl;
00168   if (m_bits)
00169     delete m_bits;
00170 }
00171 
00172 void uvm_packer_rep::allocate(int nbits, bool copy_) {
00173   // allocate new sc_bv_base with new size, and copy over contents from
00174   // old sc_bv_base
00175 
00176   int total_bits = pack_index + nbits;
00177   int new_size = 
00178     ((total_bits - 1)/UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE + 1) * UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE;
00179 #ifdef _NCSC_DEBUG
00180   assert((new_size % UVM_PACKING_BLOCK_SIZE) == 0);
00181 #endif
00182   size = new_size;
00183   if (size > max_size) { // need to allocate
00184     max_size = size;
00185     sc_bv_base* new_bv = new sc_bv_base(size);
00186     if (m_bits) {
00187       if (copy_) { 
00188         *new_bv = *m_bits;
00189       }
00190       delete m_bits;
00191     }
00192     m_bits = new_bv;
00193   }
00194 }
00195   
00196 void uvm_packer_rep::set_size(int nbits) {
00197   // check that we are in a "fresh" packer, e.g. one that has been reset
00198 #ifdef _NCSC_DEBUG  
00199   assert(size == 0);
00200   assert(pack_index == 0);
00201 #endif
00202   // no need to copy over from old sc_bv_base
00203   allocate(nbits, false);  
00204 }
00205 
00206 void uvm_packer_rep::reset() {
00207 
00208   pack_index = 0;
00209   unpack_index = 0;
00210   size = 0;
00211 }
00212 
00213 void uvm_packer_rep::inc_unpack_index(int n) {
00214   unpack_index += n;
00215   if (unpack_index > pack_index) {
00216     char msg[1024];
00217     sprintf(msg,"unpack_index=%d, pack_index=%d",unpack_index,pack_index);
00218     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_,msg);
00219   }
00220 }
00221 
00223 
00224 // put_xxx() and get_xxx() are internal uvm_packer member methods
00225 // called from the user-visible API in uvm_object:
00226 // pack_bits, pack_bytes(), pack_ints(), and
00227 // unpack_bits(), unpack_bytes(), unpack_ints()
00228 
00229 // put_xxx() is just like packing, including incrementing the packing index;
00230 // get_xxx() is not like unpacking - all the info is extracted into the 
00231 // given vector, but unpacking index is not incremented
00232   
00233 void uvm_packer_rep::put_bits(const std::vector<bool>& v) {
00234   reset();
00235   int n = v.size();
00236   set_size(n);
00237   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00238     (*m_bits)[i] = v[i];
00239   }
00240   pack_index = n;
00241 }
00242 
00243 void uvm_packer_rep::get_bits(std::vector<bool>& v) {
00244   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00245   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00246     bool b = (*m_bits)[i].to_bool();
00247     v.push_back(b);
00248   }
00249 }
00250 
00251 void uvm_packer_rep::put_bytes(const std::vector<char>& v) {
00252   reset();
00253   int n = v.size();
00254   set_size(n*8);
00255   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00256     (*m_bits).range(8*i+7,8*i) = v[i];
00257   }
00258   pack_index = 8*n;
00259 }
00260 
00261 void uvm_packer_rep::get_bytes(std::vector<char>& v) {
00262   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00263   unsigned nbytes = 1 + (n-1)/8;
00264   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nbytes; i++) {
00265     char b = (*m_bits).range(8*i+7,8*i).to_int();
00266     v.push_back(b);
00267   }
00268 }
00269 
00270 void uvm_packer_rep::put_ints(const std::vector<int>& v) {
00271   reset();
00272   int n = v.size();
00273   set_size(n*32);
00274   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00275     (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i) = v[i];
00276   }
00277   pack_index = 32*n;
00278 }
00279 
00280 void uvm_packer_rep::get_ints(std::vector<int>& v) {
00281   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00282   unsigned nints = 1 + (n-1)/32;
00283   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nints; i++) {
00284     int b = (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i).to_int();
00285     v.push_back(b);
00286   }
00287 }
00288 
00289 void uvm_packer_rep::put_uints(const std::vector<unsigned int>& v) {
00290   reset();
00291   int n = v.size();
00292   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00293     (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i) = v[i];
00294   }
00295   pack_index = 32*n;
00296 }
00297 
00298 void uvm_packer_rep::get_uints(std::vector<unsigned int>& v) {
00299   unsigned n = get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00300   unsigned nints = 1 + (n-1)/32;
00301   cout << "n = " << n << endl;
00302   cout << "nints = " << nints << endl;
00303   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nints; i++) {
00304     int b = (*m_bits).range(32*i+31,32*i).to_uint();
00305     v.push_back(b);
00306   }
00307 }
00308 
00309 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj_header(const std::string & type_name) 
00310 {
00311   pack_non_null();
00312   pack_string(type_name);
00313 }
00314 
00315 void * uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj_header() 
00316 {
00317   if (!use_metadata()) {
00318     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00319     return NULL;
00320   }
00321   std::string s;
00322   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00323     if (print_pack_info) {
00324       cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00325     }
00326     return NULL;
00327   }
00328   unpack_string(s);
00329   void *obj = NULL;
00330   string base_class_str;
00331   if (uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered(s)) {
00332     base_class_str = "uvm_object";
00333     obj = (void *) uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00334   } else if (uvm_factory::is_class_registered(s)) {
00335     base_class_str = "tlm_generic_payload";
00336     obj = uvm_factory::create_registered_class(s);
00337   }
00338   if (!obj) {
00339     char msg[1024];
00340     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00341     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00342     return NULL;
00343   }
00344   return obj;
00345 }
00347 
00348 void uvm_packer_rep::check_size(int nbits) {
00349   int capacity = size - pack_index;
00350   if (nbits >= capacity) {
00351     allocate(nbits);
00352   }
00353 }
00354 
00355 // put a 8-bit 1 meaning non-null for uvm_objects
00356 
00357 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_non_null() {
00358   int nbits = 8;
00359   check_size(nbits);
00360   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = 1;
00361   pack_index += nbits;
00362   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_non_null " << endl;
00363 }
00364 
00365 // put 8-bit 0 meaning null for uvm_objects
00366 
00367 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_null() {
00368   int nbits = 8;
00369   check_size(nbits);
00370   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = 0;
00371   pack_index += nbits;
00372   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_null " << endl;
00373 }
00374 
00375 bool uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null() {
00376   int nbits = 8;
00377   int a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_int();
00378   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00379   if (!a) { 
00380     if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null FALSE " << endl;
00381     return false;
00382   }
00383   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_non_null true " << endl;
00384   return true;
00385 }
00386 
00388 
00389 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_char(char a) {
00390   int nbits = 8;
00391   check_size(nbits);
00392   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00393   pack_index += nbits;
00394   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_char " << a << endl;
00395 }
00396 
00397 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_char(char& a) {
00398   unsigned nbits = 8;
00399   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_int();
00400   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00401   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_char -> " << a << endl;
00402 }
00403 
00405 
00406 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_int_n(unsigned long long a, unsigned nbits) {
00407   check_size(nbits);
00408   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00409   pack_index += nbits;
00410   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_int_n " << a 
00411     << " " << nbits << endl;
00412 }
00413 
00414 uint64 uvm_packer_rep::unpack_int_n(unsigned nbits) {
00415   uint64 a;
00416   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index).to_uint64();
00417   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00418   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_int_n " 
00419     << nbits << " -> " << a << endl;
00420   return a;
00421 }
00422 
00423 // after packing a string, pack a null byte at the end 
00424 
00425 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_string(std::string a) {
00426   int nchars = a.length();
00427   for (int i = 0; i < nchars; i++) {
00428     pack_char(a[i]);
00429   }
00430   pack_char(0);
00431   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_string " << a << endl;
00432 }
00433 
00434 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_string(std::string& a) {
00435   a = "";
00436   std::string cs;
00437   while (1) {
00438     char c;
00439     unpack_char(c);
00440     if (!c) break;
00441     cs = c;
00442     a = a + cs;
00443   }
00444   if (print_pack_info) 
00445     cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_string: " << a << endl;
00446 }
00447 
00448 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is packed.
00449 // if metadata is included, then before packing the uvm_object, pack 2
00450 // additional items:
00451 // 1) 8 bits set to 1 if the uvm_object is non-null, and set 
00452 // to 0 if uvm_object is null
00453 // 2) the string name of the uvm_object, as returned by get_type_name()
00454 
00455 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj(uvm_object* a) {
00456   if (use_metadata()) {
00457     if (!a) {
00458       if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj packing null"
00459         << endl;
00460       pack_null();
00461       return;
00462     }
00463     pack_obj_header(a->get_type_name());
00464   }
00465   if (!a) {
00466     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACK_NULL_,"");
00467     return;
00468   }
00469   a->pack(*m_packer);
00470   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::pack_obj " 
00471     << a->get_type_name() << endl;
00472 }
00473 
00474 // metadata affects how a nested uvm_object is unpacked.
00475 // metadata must have been packed during the corresponding packing
00476 // operation, as the packer allocates/creates the uvm_object from the
00477 // factory using the packed type name.
00478 // if metadata was not packed, then the packer errors out.
00479 
00480 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj(uvm_object*& a) {
00481   if (!use_metadata()) {
00482     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_UNPACK_OBJ_NO_METADATA_,"");
00483     a = 0;
00484     return;
00485   }
00486   std::string s;
00487   if (!unpack_non_null()) {
00488     if (print_pack_info) {
00489       cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack unpack_non_null FALSE" << endl;
00490     }
00491     a = 0;
00492     return;
00493   }
00494   unpack_string(s);
00495   //unsigned id = 0;
00496   //unpack_int_n(id, 8*sizeof(id));
00497   //s = uvm_get_type_name(id);
00498   uvm_object* obj = uvm_factory::create_uvm_object(s,"","",true);
00499   if (!obj) {
00500     char msg[1024];
00501     sprintf(msg,"Unpack uvm_object failed. Type = %s",s.c_str());
00502     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00503     return;
00504   }
00505   obj->unpack(*m_packer);
00506   a = obj;
00507   if (print_pack_info) cerr << "uvm_packer_rep::unpack_obj " << endl;
00508 }
00509 
00510 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_logic(const sc_logic& a) {
00511   check_size(1);
00512   (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, a.value());
00513   pack_index++;
00514 }
00515 
00516 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_logic(sc_logic& a) {
00517   sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00518   a = val;
00519   inc_unpack_index(1);
00520 }
00521 
00522 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_bv_base(const sc_bv_base& a) {
00523   int nbits = a.length();
00524   check_size(nbits);
00525   (*m_bits)(pack_index + nbits - 1, pack_index) = a;
00526   pack_index += nbits;
00527 }
00528 
00529 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_bv_base(sc_bv_base& a) {
00530   int nbits = a.length();
00531   a = (*m_bits)(unpack_index + nbits - 1, unpack_index);
00532   inc_unpack_index(nbits);
00533 }
00534 
00535 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_lv_base(const sc_lv_base& a) {
00536   int n = a.length();
00537   check_size(n);
00538   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00539     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = a.get_bit(i);
00540     (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, val);
00541     pack_index++;
00542   }
00543 }
00544 
00545 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_lv_base(sc_lv_base& a) {
00546   int n = a.length();
00547   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00548     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00549     a.set_bit(i, val);
00550     unpack_index++;
00551   }
00552 }
00553 
00554 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_int_base(const sc_int_base& a) {
00555   int n = a.length();
00556   check_size(n);
00557   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00558     bool val = a.test(i);
00559     if (val) {
00560       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00561     } else {
00562       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00563     }
00564     pack_index++;
00565   }
00566 }
00567 
00568 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_int_base(sc_int_base& a) {
00569   int n = a.length();
00570   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00571     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00572     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00573       a.set(i, true);
00574     } else {
00575       a.set(i, false);
00576     }
00577     unpack_index++;
00578   }
00579 }
00580 
00581 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_uint_base(const sc_uint_base& a) {
00582   int n = a.length();
00583   check_size(n);
00584   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00585     bool val = a.test(i);
00586     if (val) {
00587       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00588     } else {
00589       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00590     }
00591     pack_index++;
00592   }
00593 }
00594 
00595 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_uint_base(sc_uint_base& a) {
00596   int n = a.length();
00597   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00598     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00599     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00600       a.set(i, true);
00601     } else {
00602       a.set(i, false);
00603     }
00604     unpack_index++;
00605   }
00606 }
00607 
00608 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_signed(const sc_signed& a) {
00609   int n = a.length();
00610   check_size(n);
00611   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00612     bool val = a.test(i);
00613     if (val) {
00614       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00615     } else {
00616       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00617     }
00618     pack_index++;
00619   }
00620 }
00621 
00622 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_signed(sc_signed& a) {
00623   int n = a.length();
00624   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00625     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00626     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00627       a.set(i, true);
00628     } else {
00629       a.set(i, false);
00630     }
00631     unpack_index++;
00632   }
00633 }
00634 
00635 void uvm_packer_rep::pack_sc_unsigned(const sc_unsigned& a) {
00636   int n = a.length();
00637   check_size(n);
00638   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00639     bool val = a.test(i);
00640     if (val) {
00641       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_1);
00642     } else {
00643       (*m_bits).set_bit(pack_index, sc_dt::Log_0);
00644     }
00645     pack_index++;
00646   }
00647 }
00648 
00649 void uvm_packer_rep::unpack_sc_unsigned(sc_unsigned& a) {
00650   int n = a.length();
00651   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00652     sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t val = (*m_bits).get_bit(unpack_index);
00653     if (int(val) == int(sc_dt::Log_1)) {
00654       a.set(i, true);
00655     } else {
00656       a.set(i, false);
00657     }
00658     unpack_index++;
00659   }
00660 }
00661

00670   m_rep->use_metadata(false);
00671 }

00674   delete m_rep;
00675 }

00726 
00727 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (bool a) { 
00728   int i = a ? 1 : 0;
00729   m_rep->pack_int_n(i,1);
00730   return *this;
00731 }
00732 
00733 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (bool& a) { 
00734   a = (bool)(m_rep->unpack_int_n(1));
00735   return *this;
00736 }
00737 
00739 
00740 #define def_pack_int_operators(T) \
00741 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (T a) { \
00742   m_rep->pack_int_n(a,8*sizeof(T));\
00743   return *this;\
00744 } \
00745 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
00746   a = (T)(m_rep->unpack_int_n(8*sizeof(T))); \
00747   return *this; \
00748 }
00749 
00750 typedef unsigned char uchar;
00751 typedef unsigned short ushort;
00752 typedef unsigned int uint;
00753 typedef unsigned long ulong;
00754 
00755 def_pack_int_operators(char)

00757 def_pack_int_operators(short)
00758 def_pack_int_operators(ushort)
00759 def_pack_int_operators(int)
00760 def_pack_int_operators(uint)
00761 def_pack_int_operators(long)
00762 def_pack_int_operators(ulong)
00763 def_pack_int_operators(int64)
00764 def_pack_int_operators(uint64)

00767 
00768 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const char* a) { 
00769   if (!a) {
00770     m_rep->pack_string("");
00771   } else {
00772     m_rep->pack_string(a);
00773   }
00774   return *this;
00775 }
00776 
00777 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (std::string a) { 
00778   m_rep->pack_string(a);
00779   return *this;
00780 }
00781 
00782 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (std::string& a) { 
00783   m_rep->unpack_string(a);
00784   return *this;
00785 }

00787 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (uvm_object* a) {
00788   m_rep->pack_obj(a);
00789   return *this;
00790 }
00791 
00792 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (uvm_object*& a) {
00793   m_rep->unpack_obj(a);
00794   return *this;
00795 }
00796 
00797 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const uvm_object& a) {
00798   m_rep->pack_obj((uvm_object*)(&a));
00799   return *this;
00800 }

00802 #define def_pack_sctype_operators(T) \
00803 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (const T& a) { \
00804   m_rep->pack_##T(a);\
00805   return *this;\
00806 } \
00807 uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
00808   m_rep->unpack_##T(a); \
00809   return *this; \
00810 }
